types.html:
poser des lapins

  1. alternative form of poser un lapin (frequentative or plural)
    • 2015 January, Virginie Despentes, Vernon Subutex, volume 1, Éditions Grasset, →ISBN, page 18; republished as Frank Wynne, transl., 2018:
      L'un dans l'autre, il drague des filles sur Internet et leur pose des lapins quand elles lui donnent un rendez-vous.
      On the whole, he picks girls up on the internet and stands them up when they arrange a meeting.
trans: alternative form of poser un lapin
